name: Monster.io
description:
How To Play Monster.io ( A Game Made For LD33 ) The goal of the game is to eat 1000 citizens and not beat the boss at the end of the game. Use your mouse to move around and eat your way to death. The citizens you want to eat are the dark grey and the infected citizens will harm you and you can't escape them they are light green. Also avoid the five spikes that are placed in the game scene.Controls:

Mouse: Moves the character on the screen

Space: To clear the blood (it get's kinda messy)

Escape: To Exit Game (there is no save function)
